ingredients.item: 700g essential Waitrose British beef diced braising steak, trimmed of fat

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 180ºC, gas mark 4. Heat the oil in a large ovenproof casserole dish, add the onions and fry over a medium heat for about 5 minutes or until softened and lightly browned.
Add the casserole vegetables and cook for another 5-8 minutes or until slightly softened. Stir in the tomato purée and cook for 1 minute.
Place the beef in a large bowl and season with freshly ground black pepper. Add the flour and toss to coat. Add the beef to the pan with the vegetables and stir well.
Add the rosemary, bay leaves, ale and stock, stir well and bring to the boil. Cover with a lid and cook in the oven for 1½ hours or until the beef and vegetables are tender
Stir in the redcurrant jelly and remove the rosemary sprigs. Serve the stew with the steamed green vegetables and boiled new potatoes.
